Vietnam: Trần Nhân Tông ceded the throne to his son Trần Anh Tông.
Japan: The deadly 1293 Kamakura earthquake, followed by government in-fighting, struck Japan.
Indonesia: Mongol invasion of Java, Kublai Khan of Yuan dynasty China, sent punitive attack against Kertanegara of Singhasari. The Mongol forces were repelled.
The coronation of Nararya Sangramawijaya as the monarch of Majapahit kingdom, marked the foundation of Hindu Majapahit kingdom in eastern Java.
China: John of Montecorvino arrives in China and is appointed Archbishop of Khanbaliq (Beijing).
Burma: Wareru receives recognition as a vassal of Sukhothai
Belgium: Aldermen of Nieuwpoort accept the mediation of Guy, Count of Flanders in their dispute with the abbeys of Duinen and Bourbourg concerning a dyke built near the town.
